title: Strengthening Clinical Practical Competencies: Network Control Design Education Using Iterative Learning Control

context.prior_knowledge: Basics of network control systems, control theory, and understanding of communication protocols
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of Iterative Learning Control (ILC) and their application to networked control system design.
Learners can design bandwidth optimization strategies utilizing static/dynamic segments of the FlexRay communication protocol.
Learners can implement a periodic ILC algorithm that improves finite-iteration tracking performance in a simulation environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
